Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to certain requirements for waivers issued under the hospital-home care-physician collaboration program
Summary: Provides that health regulations may not be waived under the hospital-home care-physician collaboration program without publication and opportunity for public comment; prohibits waiver of an applicant's obligation to meet public need, character and competence, or financial feasibility requirements.
LawCode: Amd ยง2805-x, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the hospital-home care-physician collaboration program
